abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed hydroelectric project is a
            run-of-the-river, underground power station with an initial
            installed capacity of 45 MW. Included in the project are 30
            miles of transmission lines linking centers previously
            served by small diesel units. The beneficiary will be the
            Papua and New Guinea Electricity Commission (ELCOM) and the
            Borrower, as in previous loans to the Territory, will be the Administration.
